argumentText:
ARGUMENT
a b

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( a = b -> ( A rmY a ) = ( A rmY b ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( a = M -> ( A rmY a ) = ( A rmY M ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( a = N -> ( A rmY a ) = ( A rmY N ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_zssre | |- ZZ C_ RR |
| 5 |  | #P_frmy | |- rmY : ( ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) X. ZZ ) --> ZZ |
| 6 | 5 | #P_fovcl | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ a e. ZZ ) -> ( A rmY a ) e. ZZ ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_zred | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ a e. ZZ ) -> ( A rmY a ) e. RR ) |
| 8 |  | #P_ltrmy | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ a e. ZZ /\ b e. ZZ ) -> ( a < b <-> ( A rmY a ) < ( A rmY b ) ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_biimpd | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ a e. ZZ /\ b e. ZZ ) -> ( a < b -> ( A rmY a ) < ( A rmY b ) ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_3expb | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ ( a e. ZZ /\ b e. ZZ ) ) -> ( a < b -> ( A rmY a ) < ( A rmY b ) ) ) |
| 11 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 7, 10 | #P_leord1 | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ ( M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) ) -> ( M <_ N <-> ( A rmY M ) <_ ( A rmY N ) ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_3impb | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( M <_ N <-> ( A rmY M ) <_ ( A rmY N ) ) ) |
